mission: Marvel Comics explosion! Benjamin Netanyahu with lightning effects crashes through Knesset walls. CRASH! 'I am eternal!' Opposition parties vanish in comic smoke. WHOOSH! Coalition deals with exploding panels. BOOM! Juggling multiple corruption trials while texting. ZAP! Building settlements with energy beams. THWACK! Judicial reform controversy splits the nation. CRACK! 'Bibi will return... again!' WHAM! Israeli flag with lightning bolts.

script_processing.original_script: [VISUAL:] Marvel Comics explosion! Benjamin Netanyahu with lightning effects crashes through Knesset walls. CRASH! DIALOGUE: 'I am eternal!' [VISUAL:] Opposition parties vanish in comic smoke. WHOOSH! DIALOGUE: Coalition deals with exploding panels. [VISUAL:] BOOM! Juggling multiple corruption trials while texting. ZAP! DIALOGUE: Building settlements with energy beams. [VISUAL:] THWACK! Judicial reform controversy splits the nation. CRACK! DIALOGUE: 'Bibi will return... again!' [VISUAL:] WHAM! Israeli flag with lightning bolts. DIALOGUE: The ultimate comeback is coming.
script_processing.final_script: I am eternal! Coalition forces grapple with catastrophic panel failures, the energy grid ablaze. Building settlements requires precise energy beam placement, a delicate dance between creation and destruction. Bibi will return, again. Her ultimate comeback is imminent, a promise whispered on the wind. The city trembles, awaiting her arrival. Hope flickers amidst the ruins, fueled by the legend of her return. This is not merely a comeback; it is a resurgence, a phoenix rising from the ashes of conflict. The people wait, their hearts pounding with anticipation. Bibi's legacy precedes her, a testament to resilience and strength. She is the beacon in the storm, the symbol of their enduring hope. The countdown has begun. The future hangs in the balance, poised between despair and salvation
